mapper.select: select todo_no, todo_type, ref_id, ref_uuid, date_format(tu.created_at, '%Y년%m월%d일 %H시%i분') as created_at, tum.user_id as to_user_id, tum.email as to_user_email, tui.name as to_user_name, tui.phone as to_user_phone, fum.user_id as from_user_id, fum.email from_user_email, fui.name as from_user_name, fui.phone as from_user_phone from (select * from bike_user_todo where to_user_no = #{sess_user_no} order by todo_no desc limit 10) tu join bike_user_mst tum on tu.to_user_no = tum.user_no join bike_user_info tui on tum.user_no = tui.user_no join bike_user_mst fum on tu.from_user_no = fum.user_no join bike_user_info fui on fum.user_no = fui.user_no order by todo_no desc
